data.text:
Memory Lane Photo Prints and Wall Art

Film actor and director Richard Attenborough and his wife Sheila Sim are pictured

Film actor and director Richard Attenborough and his wife Sheila Sim are pictured arriving at Londons Heathrow Airport from Nice, in the South of France.

November 1971

P016943. Â© Mirrorpix

WATFORD

Mirrorpix

London

England

Media ID 21292945

Couple Director

Framed Prints

Bring a touch of classic Hollywood glamour to your home with our Framed Print from Media Storehouse and Memory Lane Prints. This beautiful photograph captures a rare moment of Film actor and director Richard Attenborough and his wife Sheila Sim, arriving at London's Heathrow Airport from Nice, France in 1971. The high-quality print is expertly framed in a contemporary style, adding an air of sophistication and intrigue to any room. Relive the golden age of cinema with this timeless piece.

Photo Prints

Step back in time with this stunning photograph from Memory Lane Prints, featuring a classic moment captured by Mirrorpix. Film actor and director Richard Attenborough and his wife, Sheila Sim, are elegantly dressed and beaming with joy as they arrive at London's Heathrow Airport from Nice, France, in November 1971. This timeless image is part of our Media Storehouse range of Photographic Prints, perfect for adding a touch of history and charm to your home or office decor.

Poster Prints

Step back in time with our exquisite poster print from Memory Lane Prints featuring a rare and intimate moment of Film actor and director Richard Attenborough and his wife Sheila Sim. Captured at London's Heathrow Airport in November 1971 as they returned from Nice, France, this vintage photograph is a must-have for any film or history enthusiast. Printed on high-quality paper, this poster is a beautiful addition to any room, bringing a touch of nostalgia and elegance to your space.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Step into the past with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse, featuring a captivating image of the beloved film actor and director, Richard Attenborough, and his wife Sheila Sim. This intriguing puzzle, brought to you by Mirrorpix from Memory Lane Prints, captures a moment in time as they arrive at London's Heathrow Airport from Nice, France, in November 1971. Piece together this charming puzzle to bring the history and nostalgia of this iconic couple into your home.
